General.Name: Direcional Engenharia S.A
General.Description: Direcional Engenharia S.A. operates as a real estate development and construction company in Brazil. It primarily develops and builds projects for low-income and middle-income families primarily in the Northern, Northeastern, Midwestern, and Southeastern regions. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Belo Horizonte, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua dos Otoni, 177, Belo Horizonte, MG, Brazil, 30150-270
